local_intent: Align to the bread and execute the grasp using the precomputed key, then verify the grasp is stable.
assumptions: Bread may require a re-detect if not currently visible.
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase: (perceive) visibility or re-detect, (align) precise approach, (act) Pick with 'bread_grasp', (verify) IsGraspStable, matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence.
